</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Forces a flag texture onto a flag carrier (unit, vehicle or flag pole). No flag holder is required. If "" is used as texture, the texture is removed. This will override regularly owned flags. This type of flag texture cannot be retrieved using [[flagTexture]], but [[getForcedFlagTexture]].
<template lineStart="1"><title>Informative </title><part><name index="1"/><value> Forced flag texture is an additional flag texture, which visually overrides original flag texture and therefore is very expensive to simulate, so use the functionality sparingly.</value></part></template> </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> object [[forceFlagTexture]] texture </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> object: [[Object]] - vehicle, unit of flag pole </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> texture: [[String]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[player]] [[forceFlagTexture]] "\A3\Data_F\Flags\Flag_red_CO.paa";</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[setFlagTexture]], [[flag]], [[flagOwner]], [[setFlagOwner]], [[setFlagSide]], [[setObjectTexture]], [[setObjectTextureGlobal]], [[flagSide]], [[flagTexture]], [[setFlagAnimationPhase]], [[flagAnimationPhase]], [[getForcedFlagTexture]], [[Flag Textures]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
</value></part></template>
